channel.title: Comments on: MagnaPedia. A Wiki and a Dapp, “MagnaPedia” polling and voting to return a sovereign House of Commons
channel.description: Exegesis Hermeneutics Flux Capacitor of Truthiness

item.title: By: MagnaPedia. A Wiki and a Dapp, “MagnaPedia” polling and voting – Not The Grub Street Journal
item.dc:creator: MagnaPedia. A Wiki and a Dapp, “MagnaPedia” polling and voting – Not The Grub Street Journal
item.description: […] /2019/04/11/magnapedia-a-wiki-and-a-dapp-magnapedia-polling-and-v… Introduction, Overview. Do not remove!!! As a response to the dissatisfaction of a Democratic vote being ignored ( Brexit) and a realisation laid bare that Democracy in the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland does not do what it says on the tin. John ( Slog Ward) and Roger ( Tonefreqhz) Lewis decided to provide a Wiki portal and series of Dapps to help independent or sovereign candidates coordinate voters to combine votes behind one non-narrative based candidate in each local election being the subject of any particular vote. The Idea is to provide the Materials and resources digitally and the location in Open Source web 3 space to build a Launchpad for local subsidiary canton (PDC) democracy cells and construct the necessary Democraticrocketss from components again supplied with a recipe book for local vernacular campaigning to tailor Ground games to particular ground game conditions. The challenge is as the previous paragraphs show to provide the Kit for PDC canto democracy with human readable and understandable instructions. Roger’s Git Hub has a wide selection of Open source repositories from which the initial suite of Dapps and the Wiki platform to be built for the active roll out. https://github.com/tonefreqhz Presently The Initiative is on Everipedia, https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/magnapedia-2 and is explained in a Beerer App here. https://wikiballotprimaries.beezer.com/ The Slog has increasingly developed the initiative narrative successively for the past few weeks, At the time of this edit 11th April 2019, The Slogs latest. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/04/10/opinion-time-for-a-coalition-of-disenfranchised-vulnerable-britannia/ And the Initial Slog post and comment. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/03/26/brexit-anarchy-how-lies-short-memories-and-apathy-killed-a-dream/ https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Newport_West_By-Election We made a few mockup apps for voting7polling and scoping out what exists. EOS and Everipedia, it has to be said, is the state of the art and well ahead of the field and the other wikis in development experimentation for this initiative are http://cccamp.federated.wiki/view/fedwiki-on-ipfs & https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Running_MediaWiki_on_Debian_or_Ubuntu & https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki Inspiration is also being drawn from Wiki Spooks https://wikispooks.com/wiki/Main_Page And this instance of Federated Wiki is along the lines of our own development track and thinking. http://parliamentofthings.org/view/welcome-visitors On the Direct democracy portal People Get the Wiki Idea pretty quickly and also instinctively Encyclopedia Britannica has I think a deep root in British Culture as an Icon of Knowledge and learning. Some Brand Names. Magna-Pedia Democrapedia Democapedia Demopedia EncyclopediaBrexitannica Thingapedia ( Thing Oldest form of Democracy Thing)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thing_(assembly) MagnaPedia Taking back the Commons. Everpedia/Ipfs-Zero Net The Wiki format works it is replicated in all sorts of successful context Wiki Spooks, Rational Wiki are Two obvious ones This embeddable constituency map will be linked with a Web Browser specifically optimised to highlöight Election issues of Direct Democracy, Chartist ideal, and sovereign Brexit. Each Wiki Page will load with each interactive constituent and Chapters seeking ideal Independent or endorsed existing Sovereign MP’s. […]
item.content:encoded: […] /2019/04/11/magnapedia-a-wiki-and-a-dapp-magnapedia-polling-and-v… Introduction, Overview. Do not remove!!! As a response to the dissatisfaction of a Democratic vote being ignored ( Brexit) and a realisation laid bare that Democracy in the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland does not do what it says on the tin. John ( Slog Ward) and Roger ( Tonefreqhz) Lewis decided to provide a Wiki portal and series of Dapps to help independent or sovereign candidates coordinate voters to combine votes behind one non-narrative based candidate in each local election being the subject of any particular vote. The Idea is to provide the Materials and resources digitally and the location in Open Source web 3 space to build a Launchpad for local subsidiary canton (PDC) democracy cells and construct the necessary Democraticrocketss from components again supplied with a recipe book for local vernacular campaigning to tailor Ground games to particular ground game conditions. The challenge is as the previous paragraphs show to provide the Kit for PDC canto democracy with human readable and understandable instructions. Roger’s Git Hub has a wide selection of Open source repositories from which the initial suite of Dapps and the Wiki platform to be built for the active roll out. https://github.com/tonefreqhz Presently The Initiative is on Everipedia, https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/magnapedia-2 and is explained in a Beerer App here. https://wikiballotprimaries.beezer.com/ The Slog has increasingly developed the initiative narrative successively for the past few weeks, At the time of this edit 11th April 2019, The Slogs latest. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/04/10/opinion-time-for-a-coalition-of-disenfranchised-vulnerable-britannia/ And the Initial Slog post and comment. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/03/26/brexit-anarchy-how-lies-short-memories-and-apathy-killed-a-dream/ https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Newport_West_By-Election We made a few mockup apps for voting7polling and scoping out what exists. EOS and Everipedia, it has to be said, is the state of the art and well ahead of the field and the other wikis in development experimentation for this initiative are http://cccamp.federated.wiki/view/fedwiki-on-ipfs &  https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Running_MediaWiki_on_Debian_or_Ubuntu & https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki Inspiration is also being drawn from Wiki Spooks https://wikispooks.com/wiki/Main_Page And this instance of Federated Wiki is along the lines of our own development track and thinking. http://parliamentofthings.org/view/welcome-visitors On the Direct democracy portal People Get the Wiki Idea pretty quickly and also instinctively Encyclopedia Britannica has I think a deep root in British Culture as an Icon of Knowledge and learning. Some Brand Names. Magna-Pedia Democrapedia Democapedia Demopedia EncyclopediaBrexitannica Thingapedia  ( Thing Oldest form of Democracy Thing)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thing_(assembly) MagnaPedia Taking back the Commons. Everpedia/Ipfs-Zero Net The Wiki format works it is replicated in all sorts of successful context Wiki Spooks, Rational Wiki are Two obvious ones This embeddable constituency map will be linked with a Web Browser specifically optimised to highlöight Election issues of Direct Democracy, Chartist ideal, and sovereign Brexit. Each Wiki Page will load with each interactive constituent and Chapters seeking ideal Independent or endorsed existing Sovereign MP’s. […]

item.title: By: HTML File from mMagnapedia Edit war on Everipedia. – RogersLongHairBlog
item.dc:creator: HTML File from mMagnapedia Edit war on Everipedia. – RogersLongHairBlog
item.description: […] https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2019/04/11/magnapedia-a-wiki-and-a-dapp-magnapedia-polling-a… Introduction, Overview. Do not remove!!! As a response to the dissatisfaction of a Democratic vote being ignored ( Brexit) and a realisation laid bare that Democracy in the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland does not do what it says on the tin. John ( Slog Ward) and Roger ( Tonefreqhz) Lewis decided to provide a Wiki portal and series of Dapps to help independent or sovereign candidates coordinate voters to combine votes behind one non-narrative based candidate in each local election being the subject of any particular vote. The Idea is to provide the Materials and resources digitally and the location in Open Source web 3 space to build a Launchpad for local subsidiary canton (PDC) democracy cells and construct the necessary Democraticrocketss from components again supplied with a recipe book for local vernacular campaigning to tailor Ground games to particular ground game conditions. The challenge is as the previous paragraphs show to provide the Kit for PDC canto democracy with human readable and understandable instructions. Roger’s Git Hub has a wide selection of Open source repositories from which the initial suite of Dapps and the Wiki platform to be built for the active roll out. https://github.com/tonefreqhz Presently The Initiative is on Everipedia, https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/magnapedia-1/ and Fandom https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki and is explained in a Beerer App here. https://cantondd.beezer.com/ The Slog has increasingly developed the initiative narrative successively for the past few weeks, At the time of this edit 11th April 2019, The Slogs latest. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/04/10/opinion-time-for-a-coalition-of-disenfranchised-vulnerable-britannia/ And the Initial Slog post and comment. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/03/26/brexit-anarchy-how-lies-short-memories-and-apathy-killed-a-dream/ https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Newport_West_By-Election We made a few mockup apps for voting7polling and scoping out what exists. EOS and Everipedia, it has to be said, is the state of the art and well ahead of the field and the other wikis in development experimentation for this initiative are http://cccamp.federated.wiki/view/fedwiki-on-ipfs & https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Running_MediaWiki_on_Debian_or_Ubuntu & https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki Inspiration is also being drawn from Wiki Spooks https://wikispooks.com/wiki/Main_Page And this instance of Federated Wiki is along the lines of our own development track and thinking. http://parliamentofthings.org/view/welcome-visitors On the Direct democracy portal People Get the Wiki Idea pretty quickly and also instinctively Encyclopedia Britannica has I think a deep root in British Culture as an Icon of Knowledge and learning. Some Brand Names. Magna-Pedia Democrapedia Democapedia Demopedia EncyclopediaBrexitannica Thingapedia ( Thing Oldest form of Democracy Thing)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thing_(assembly) MagnaPedia Taking back the Commons. Everpedia/Ipfs-Zero Net The Wiki format works it is replicated in all sorts of successful context Wiki Spooks, Rational Wiki are Two obvious ones This embeddable constituency map will be linked with a Web Browser specifically optimised to highlöight Election issues of Direct Democracy, Chartist ideal, and sovereign Brexit. Each Wiki Page will load with each interactive constituent and Chapters seeking ideal Independent or endorsed existing Sovereign MP’s. […]
item.content:encoded: […] https://longhairedmusings.wordpress.com/2019/04/11/magnapedia-a-wiki-and-a-dapp-magnapedia-polling-a… Introduction, Overview. Do not remove!!! As a response to the dissatisfaction of a Democratic vote being ignored ( Brexit) and a realisation laid bare that Democracy in the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland does not do what it says on the tin. John ( Slog Ward) and Roger ( Tonefreqhz) Lewis decided to provide a Wiki portal and series of Dapps to help independent or sovereign candidates coordinate voters to combine votes behind one non-narrative based candidate in each local election being the subject of any particular vote. The Idea is to provide the Materials and resources digitally and the location in Open Source web 3 space to build a Launchpad for local subsidiary canton (PDC) democracy cells and construct the necessary Democraticrocketss from components again supplied with a recipe book for local vernacular campaigning to tailor Ground games to particular ground game conditions. The challenge is as the previous paragraphs show to provide the Kit for PDC canto democracy with human readable and understandable instructions. Roger’s Git Hub has a wide selection of Open source repositories from which the initial suite of Dapps and the Wiki platform to be built for the active roll out. https://github.com/tonefreqhz Presently The Initiative is on Everipedia, https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/magnapedia-1/ and Fandom  https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki and is explained in a Beerer App here.  https://cantondd.beezer.com/ The Slog has increasingly developed the initiative narrative successively for the past few weeks, At the time of this edit 11th April 2019, The Slogs latest. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/04/10/opinion-time-for-a-coalition-of-disenfranchised-vulnerable-britannia/ And the Initial Slog post and comment. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/03/26/brexit-anarchy-how-lies-short-memories-and-apathy-killed-a-dream/ https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Newport_West_By-Election We made a few mockup apps for voting7polling and scoping out what exists. EOS and Everipedia, it has to be said, is the state of the art and well ahead of the field and the other wikis in development experimentation for this initiative are http://cccamp.federated.wiki/view/fedwiki-on-ipfs &  https://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Manual:Running_MediaWiki_on_Debian_or_Ubuntu & https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki Inspiration is also being drawn from Wiki Spooks https://wikispooks.com/wiki/Main_Page And this instance of Federated Wiki is along the lines of our own development track and thinking. http://parliamentofthings.org/view/welcome-visitors On the Direct democracy portal  People Get the Wiki Idea pretty quickly and also instinctively Encyclopedia Britannica has I think a deep root in British Culture as an Icon of Knowledge and learning. Some Brand Names. Magna-Pedia Democrapedia Democapedia Demopedia EncyclopediaBrexitannica Thingapedia  ( Thing Oldest form of Democracy Thing)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thing_(assembly) MagnaPedia Taking back the Commons. Everpedia/Ipfs-Zero Net The Wiki format works it is replicated in all sorts of successful context Wiki Spooks, Rational Wiki are Two obvious ones This embeddable constituency map will be linked with a Web Browser specifically optimised to highlöight Election issues of Direct Democracy, Chartist ideal, and sovereign Brexit. Each Wiki Page will load with each interactive constituent and Chapters seeking ideal Independent or endorsed existing Sovereign MP’s. […]

As a response to the dissatisfaction of a Democratic vote being ignored ( Brexit) and a realisation laid bare that Democracy in the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland does not do what it says on the tin. The challenge is as the previous paragraphs show to provide the Kit for PDC canto democracy with human readable and understandable instructions. Roger’s Git Hub has a wide selection of Open source repositories from which the initial suite of Dapps and the Wiki platform to be built for the active roll out. https://github.com/tonefreqhz Presently The Initiative is on Everipedia, https://everipedia.org/wiki/lang_en/magnapedia-1/ and Fandom https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Magnapedia_Wiki and is explained in a Beerer App here. https://cantondd.beezer.com/ The Slog has increasingly developed the initiative narrative successively for the past few weeks, At the time of this edit 11th April 2019, The Slogs latest. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/04/10/opinion-time-for-a-coalition-of-disenfranchised-vulnerable-britannia/ And the Initial Slog post and comment. https://hat4uk.wordpress.com/2019/03/26/brexit-anarchy-how-lies-short-memories-and-apathy-killed-a-dream/ https://magnapedia.fandom.com/wiki/Newport_West_By-Election We made a few mockup apps for voting7polling and scoping out what exists. Some Brand Names. Magna-Pedia Democrapedia Democapedia Demopedia EncyclopediaBrexitannica Thingapedia ( Thing Oldest form of Democracy Thing)https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thing_(assembly) MagnaPedia Taking back the Commons. Everpedia/Ipfs-Zero Net The Wiki format works it is replicated in all sorts of successful context Wiki Spooks, Rational Wiki are Two obvious ones This embeddable constituency map will be linked with a Web Browser specifically optimised to highlöight Election issues of Direct Democracy, Chartist ideal, and sovereign Brexit. Each Wiki Page will load with each interactive constituent and Chapters seeking ideal Independent or endorsed existing Sovereign MP’s. […]

As a response to the dissatisfaction of a Democratic vote being ignored ( Brexit) and a realisation laid bare that Democracy in the United Kingdom of Great Britain & Northern Ireland does not do what it says on the tin.
